item.title: automated git commits
item.description:
overview

a tool for devs who want to streamline their git workflow. it uses the groq api to auto-generate commit messages based on your staged changes by tracking your git diff.â€‹

how it works

the prepare-commit-msg hook taps into your git process and crafts a commit message using an llm. you can apply this hook across multiple repos using the update_hooks.sh script. just set your GROQ_API_KEY as an environment variable.
